titleStmt.title: Songs of Sion Set for the ioy of gods deere ones, vvho sitt here by the brookes of this vvorlds Babel, & vveepe vvhen they thinke on Hierusalem vvhich is on highe. By W.L.
titleStmt.author: Loe, William, d. 1645.

notesStmt.note: Dedications to the subsections signed: W. Loe.
Title from 4r; imprint, B1r, reads: Hamborough Januarij 24. 1620.
Signatures: 4,5 A-L¹² . Of four copies recorded, all are apparently thus incomplete.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
